metadata.description: Looplia Skills provides curated skills—packaged as a Claude Code-compatible plugin—to accelerate workflow design, orchestration, and execution.

plugins.name: search-and-research
plugins.description: Skills for searching and discovering information across the internet. Use these skills when you need to find content from various sources like web pages, feeds, videos, and more.

plugins.name: context-management
plugins.description: Skills for managing context, planning, and maintaining persistent memory across sessions. Use when you need to organize multi-step tasks, track progress, or preserve information.
